Description: Thiem, the 2018 and 2019 finalist, went down 6-2, 7-5 to Finland's Otto Virtanen and was then presented with a commemorative trophy by tournament director Amelie Mauresmo.

Title: India’s smaller rice crop paves way for prolonged export curbs
Description: Production in India, the world’s largest rice exporter, is under unusually intense focus after New Delhi banned exports of non-basmati white rice in July, sending global prices surging

Title: 2024 turns out to be the worst-ever season for mango growers in Rayalaseema in five decades
Description: With over 80% dip in yield following adverse weather conditions, the prospects of earning profits have faded; the situation has turned adverse, as competitors from Telangana and Tamil Nadu started supplying stocks to the pulp units predominantly located in Chittoor district

Title: SEBI said to find Adani offshore investors in violation of disclosure rules
Description: SEBI found a several offshore funds invested in Adani Group companies violated disclosure rules and in breach of investment limits

Title: Exploring century-old homes, and attending intimate concerts at the Chettinad Festival
Description: We walked across bright Athangudi tiles, under sparkling Belgian chandeliers at century-old homes, listened to intimate concerts and learnt how to make mandi at tThe second edition of The Chettinad Heritage & Cultural Ffestival

Title: WHO updates Bacterial Pathogens Priority List as critical priority pathogens continue to present major global threat
Description: The list features 15 families of antibiotic-resistant bacteria grouped into critical, high and medium categories for prioritisation.

Title: Nifty, Sensex settle lower; HDFC Bank, Reliance, ICICI Bank major drags
Description: Paring all its early gains, the 30-share BSE Sensex went lower by 383.69 points or 0.52% to settle at 73,511.85.

Title: ‘Flex X Cop’ K-Drama review: Ahn Bo-Hyun and Park Ji-hyun’s police procedural is an engaging watch from start-to-finish
Description: There is a lot to love in this largely fun and thoroughly engaging police procedural, with four immensely likeable detectives at its helm

Title: Sceptical Nizamabad farmers ask why PM has not laid foundation stone for Turmeric Board
Description: After dominating the region’s electoral stage for almost a decade, turmeric has lost its sheen; the PM’s announcement of a National Turmeric Board has not satisfied farmers, who also ask for MSP

Title: The journey of pothichoru from homes to hospitals in Kerala
Description: This unusual welfare programme sees families cook a little extra each day to feed thousands of people in Kerala government hospitals

Title: Sunil Chhetri’s Indian national team career and achievements | In pictures
Description: A look at Sunil Chhetri’s illustrious 19-year stint with the Indian national football team as he announces his retirement

Title: Shakira wins legal battle over tax evasion charges in Spain
Description: The case, which began in July, alleged that Shakira had evaded Euro 6.6 million in taxes in 2018 through the use of offshore companies and tax havens

Title: India has ‘unexplored’ opportunities: Warren Buffett
Description: Warren Buffett sees ‘unexplored’ opportunities in India for Berkshire Hathaway, with potential for future investments in the market

Title: Expectations of future monetary policy impact stock markets more than rate announcements: RBI paper
Description: Why is there volatility in the equity markets on the day of the monetary policy announcement? This working paper prepared by RBI officials finds out

Title: Zee seeks $90 million termination fee from Sony for calling off merger
Description: It has sought termination fees from two Sony Group entities — Sony Pictures Networks India, now known as Culver Max Entertainment and Bangla Entertainment.

Title: Govt. should announce legally backed minimum procurement price for food crops, says Prakash Kammaradi
Description: Karnataka Agriculture Price Commission headed by Prakash Kammaradi submitted a report on the legally backed MSP to the government in 2018

Title: Madras Players’ Kamalakshi weaves together music, dance and theatre to narrate the story of a devadasi
Description: Directed by PC Ramakrishna, and starring Sikkil Gurucharan and Sumitra Nitin, the play had its heart in the right place, but slipped during execution

Title: ‘IF’ movie review: John Krasinski’s sweet ode to childhood innocence wears thin
Description: Despite its occasional flashes of sweetness, the film’s lack of depth makes it more of a half-hearted daydream than a vivid adventure

Title: Breast cancer awareness month: Stay vigilant, stay healthy
Description: October marks breast cancer awareness month. Here’s what we need to know and do to prevent it
